== Introduction ==

Christian Ubuntu (Ubuntu Christian Edition) system geared towards Christians. The goal of Ubuntu Christian Edition is to bring the power and security of Ubuntu to Christians. Ubuntu Christian Edition is suitable for both desktop and server use. Ubuntu Christian Edition includes the best available Christian software. The latest release contains <nowiki>[[Xiphos]]</nowiki> (nee !GnomeSword), BibleMemorizer, BibleTime, and much more.
